keys: statue baroque de David de renesaince
estátua baroque de David do renesaince
statua baroque di David di renesaince
estatua barroca de David del renesaince

      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:s01.klascement.net:21446</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>KC</catalog>
            <entry>21446</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="nl">Baroko versus renesance</string>
          </title>
          <language>nl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Two photos of two staues, one baroque, the other renesaince, both celebrating one hero.
Pupils have to compare styles and means of expression.
They guess the name of the hero (David - Old Testament) and they describe their impression.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">baroque renesaince David statue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Travel well</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">universal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Travelwell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eQNet</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>4</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei Fotos von zwei staues, ein Barock, das andere renesaince,
beide, die ein hero.Pupils feiern, müssen Arten vergleichen und 
Mittel von expression.They schätzen, daß der Name des Heldes (David 
- altes Testament) und sie ihren Eindruck beschreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux photos de deux staues, l'un baroque, l'autre renesaince, 
tous les deux qui célèbrent un hero.Pupils doivent comparer des 
modèles et les moyens d'expression.They devinent que le nom du héros
(David - vieux testament) et eux décrivent leur impression.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Duas fotos de dois staues, um baroque, o outro renesaince, 
ambos que comemoram um hero.Pupils têm que comparar estilos e os 
meios de expression.They supõem que o nome do herói (David - 
testament velho) e descrevem sua impressão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due foto di due staues, un baroque, l'altro renesaince, 
entrambi che celebrano un hero.Pupils devono confrontare gli stili ed 
i mezzi di expression.They indovinano che il nome del hero (David - 
vecchio Testamento) e descrivono la loro impressione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο φωτογραφίες δύο staues, ένα μπαρόκ, το άλλο 
renesaince, και οι δύο γιορτάζοντας μαθητές ενός ήρωα πρέπει 
να συγκρίνουν τις μορφές και τα μέσα της έκφρασης που υποθέτουν 
το όνομα του ήρωα (Δαβίδ - παλαιά διαθήκη) και περιγράφουν την 
εντύπωσή τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos fotos de dos staues, un Barroco, el otro renesaince, ambos
que celebran un hero.Pupils tienen que comparar estilos y los medios 
de expression.They conjeturan que el nombre del héroe (David - viejo 
testamento) y ellos describen su impresión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">barocke renesaince David Statue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spielraumvertiefung</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
